verses.verse: But in the last <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and it shall be exalted <S%H5375><s%> above the hills; <S%H1389><s%> and people <S%H5971><s%> shall flow <S%H5102><s%> to it.

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come, <S%H1980><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go <S%H5927><s%> up to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> and he will teach <S%H3384><s%> us of his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and we will walk <S%H3212><s%> in his paths: <S%H734><s%> for the law <S%H8451><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And he shall judge <S%H8199><s%> among <S%H996><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and rebuke <S%H3198><s%> strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off; and they shall beat <S%H3807><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> into plowshares, <S%H855><s%> and their spears <S%H2595><s%> into pruning hooks: <S%H4211><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> shall not lift <S%H5375><s%> up a sword <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H413><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they learn <S%H3925><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

But they shall sit <S%H3427><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> his vine <S%H1612><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> his fig <S%H8384><s%> tree; and none <S%H369><s%> shall make them afraid: <S%H2729><s%> for the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

For all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> will walk <S%H3212><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of his god, <S%H430><s%> and we will walk <S%H3212><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> will I assemble <S%H622><s%> her that halts, <S%H6761><s%> and I will gather <S%H6908><s%> her that is driven <S%H5080><s%> out, and her that I have afflicted; <S%H7489><s%>

And I will make <S%H7760><s%> her that halted <S%H6761><s%> a remnant, <S%H7611><s%> and her that was cast <S%H1972><s%> far off a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them in mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> from now on, <S%H6258><s%> even for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

And you, O tower <S%H4026><s%> of the flock, <S%H5739><s%> the strong <S%H6076><s%> hold <S%H6076><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> to you shall it come, <S%H857><s%> even the first <S%H7223><s%> dominion; <S%H4475><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> do you cry <S%H7321><s%> out aloud? <S%H7452><s%> is there no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in you? is your counselor <S%H3289><s%> perished? <S%H6><s%> for pangs <S%H2427><s%> have taken <S%H2388><s%> you as a woman in travail. <S%H3205><s%>

Be in pain, <S%H2342><s%> and labor <S%H1518><s%> to bring <S%H1518><s%> forth, <S%H1518><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> like a woman in travail: <S%H3205><s%> for now <S%H6258><s%> shall you go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city, <S%H7151><s%> and you shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and you shall go <S%H935><s%> even to Babylon; <S%H894><s%> there shall you be delivered; <S%H5337><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall redeem <S%H1350><s%> you from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> also many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are gathered <S%H622><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, that say, <S%H559><s%> Let her be defiled, <S%H2610><s%> and let our eye <S%H5869><s%> look <S%H2372><s%> on Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

But they know <S%H3045><s%> not the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> they his counsel: <S%H6098><s%> for he shall gather <S%H6908><s%> them as the sheaves <S%H5995><s%> into the floor. <S%H1637><s%>

Arise <S%H6965><s%> and thresh, <S%H1758><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for I will make <S%H7760><s%> your horn <S%H7161><s%> iron, <S%H1270><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> your hoofs <S%H6541><s%> brass: <S%H5154><s%> and you shall beat <S%H1854><s%> in pieces many <S%H7227><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> and I will consecrate <S%H2763><s%> their gain <S%H1214><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and their substance <S%H2428><s%> to the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>
